oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Stamps Quartet - American Beauty Flour #17 and #18 - 1947-06-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Stamp Quartet (musical group) performing a variety of gospel tunes. The broadcast is sponsored by the American Beauty Flour. The show is hosted by Roy George (entertainer). The broadcast is recorded at the KWHI radio station in Brenham, Texas. The recording is listed as show number seventeen and eighteen. The recording is from June 10, 1947.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Stamps Quartet; Roy George
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Roy George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (00:06) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (00:22) George introduces Frank Stamps -- (00:37) Stamps greets the audience -- (00:58) I Thank My Savior For it All (Stamps Quartet) -- (03:56) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (05:14) Echoes From the Glory Shore (Stamps Quartet) -- (07:33) Stamp performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (08:09) I Love the Lord (Stamps Quartet) -- (10:43) Give Me Your Hand (Stamps Quartet) -- (12:33) George and Stamp perform an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (12:58) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (13:19) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (13:26) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet) -- (13:41) George introduces Frank Stamps -- (13::56) Stamps greets the audience -- (14:13) I'll Ride on the Clouds With My Lord (Stamps Quartet) -- (15:59) George performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (17:13) Let Me Draw Nearer to Thee -- (21:28) When God Dips His Love in Me Heart (Stamps Quartet) -- (23:59) Stamps performs an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (24:14) Like a Rainbow in the Sky (Stamps Quartet) -- (25:49) George and Stamp perform an American Beauty Flour radio spot -- (26:17) American Beauty Flour Theme (Stamps Quartet)
